body_html:
I actually already have an equivalent change internally that I was going to send out for review today. There are quite a few call sites internally, so it's easier to make the change there.

Note that I'm going to change the signature to:
Status FileExists(const string& fname); where it returns NOT_FOUND when it doesn't exist. That matches some existing conventions that we're using.

body:
I actually already have an equivalent change internally that I was going to send out for review today. There are quite a few call sites internally, so it's easier to make the change there.

Note that I'm going to change the signature to:
`Status FileExists(const string& fname);` where it returns NOT_FOUND when it doesn't exist. That matches some existing conventions that we're using.
